name: reutilize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to use something again in an effective way: Nuclear waste could easily be reutilized in a safe way, as they're doing in France. Being able to re-utilize the airport will be a focus of our discussions. Related words
utilize
reutilization
More examplesFewer examplesEncouraging manufacturers to reutilize their components will have a huge long-term positive impact on the environment.The products of the normal lysosomal function are usually reutilized by the cell.These materials are rarely recovered and re-utilized during renovation or refurbishment.
